data.actual_result: You cannot do anything. All you can do, is just scroll up and down.
data.expected_result: You should be led to wherever you click.
data.short_description: When in-app notification is on your screen, you can't do anything but just scroll up and down until you close it.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a in-app notification - Try to go to another channel, another server, open a friend page, etc.
